column5: A group of friends will be headed to the Sturgeon Lake area of Ontario in the middle of Sept. Wondering if anyone has information about the area. The only other lake I can remember is Lake of the Bays. Will be staying at the south end of the lake. Outfitter told us there are numerous good eye lake within a few miles- fact or fiction. thanks in advance.
Blue boy, I just sent you an email. Pooch
